articles.description: Columbian performer Maluma was not happy with the line of questioning he faced during a TV interview and stormed off set after calling the presenter rude over human rights questions
articles.content:
The Columbian singer behind the Fifa World Cup anthem has stormed out of a TV interview after being accused of 'whitewashing' human rights abuses in Qatar. 
 Maluma joins forces with Nicki Minaj and… [+2911 chars]

articles.title: TV tonight: hit sitcom Ghosts gets a glossy US adaptation - The Guardian
articles.description: The adaptation lacks the charms of its original cast. Plus, the BBC Young Jazz Musician 2022 is revealed. Here’s everything to watch this evening
articles.content:
Ghosts US
8.30pm, BBC Three
